name: Tyche (omega797)
description:
The goddess Tyche is playing with the fate of Greece and it's your job to set things right! Fight luck itself with ancient prophecies and probabilities to keep fickle fortune from changing history!

Tyche is a game about carving out victory despite the whims of the goddess of fortune and her accursed RNG. 

You build a strategy that maximizes your parties' chance of success while minimizing the number of turns required to defeat the *Enemy Cards* of the scenario. You're not alone! The Oracle has offered prophecies in each scenario to fight against random chance. Using that knowledge is the key to reliable victory! History should be set in stone, right?'

Beat the fates, optimizing for minimal required turns and maximum survival rate. Compete anonymously against the best scores of your fellow jammers.
